item.title: ;;;eThe Foundation of Diffusion Models:;;;e;;;c扩散模型的基石：;;;cDDPM
item.description:
<!-- ##{'script':'<script src='https://OmnisyR.github.io/assets/HyperTOC.js'></script>'}## -->
;;;a ;;;;;;;eMarkov chain::The state at a given moment is only related to the state at the previous moment, i.e., $x_t = f(x_{t - 1})$, without the involvement of states at other moments. A chain formed by a number of such state relationships constitutes a Markov chain. Therefore, Markov chains have the following special properties:;;;e;;;c马尔可夫链::某一时刻的状态只与上一时刻的状态相关，即$x_t = f(x_{t - 1})$，不需要其他时刻的状态参与，若干个这样的状态关系组成的链条便形成了马尔科夫链。
